name: Laser Skulls
description:
Dr Skultek has you now...

Laser Skulls is a third person arena game inspired by the Ratchet and Clank series. Fight against your creator, the evil Dr Skultek, as he uses you to test out some of his newer creations.

Updates:
19/11/2016 - Added co-op mutiplayer and singleplayer leaderboard. Fixed many bug. More a e s t h e t i c.

16/12/2016 - Put keyboard/mouse controls back in, would still recommend using Xbox controller.

Matt Duan, Simon Newport, Brock Searle

Featuring Forrest Anthony as the voice of Dr Skultek.

**Xbox controller highly recommended**
(V50_13 has keyboard/mouse but fairly untested at this stage)
